about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in physics-driven gameplay, mastering ball control to overcome each challenge. Collect coins, unlock hidden trophies, and customize your ball with over 30 unique skins. With no checkpoints to hold you back, every twist and turn presents a new opportunity to test your skills. Prepare for the ultimate challenge with Speed Run mode, where even the most skilled players will face their toughest test yet. Enjoy more than 100 levels and try to beat them all!

Roll the Ball—where excitement meets endless possibilities. Are you ready to roll?

TIME RUSH

Time Rush Mode thrusts players into a whirlwind of excitement, navigating each level against the relentless ticking of the clock. Encounter Timur for backstory hints, enriching the journey with depth and intrigue. Collect coins for customization and to influence star ratings, unlocking hard mode for each level with three stars. Discover hidden trophies for added challenge. With 30 levels and 6 bonus levels across three biomes, Time Rush Mode promises an epic odyssey of discovery and excitement.

CHALLENGE

In Challenge Mode, players must endure for a set duration to advance to subsequent levels. This mode introduces the ability to jump and activate slow motion, though the latter impacts the potential star rating at level completion. Each use of slow motion deducts one star from the achievable total, with a maximum of three stars per level. Prepare to face an array of challenges, including confrontations with frenzied balls, snowmen, and dynamic platforms. With 20 core levels and 4 bonus stages, a variety of tests awaits eager players.

SPEED RUN

Embark on a speed run like no other, where time is but a measure of your mastery. No strict time limits constrain you; instead, your journey's duration is the ultimate gauge of your skill. Conquering the heights of this world demands precision, perseverance, and the willingness to confront numerous obstacles strewn along the path. With the finish line set at a formidable 1000 meters, expect a challenging ascent filled with traps and trials. As you navigate this arduous terrain, Timur will offer guidance and companionship to Sparky, the intrepid ball at the heart of the adventure.

LEVEL EDITOR

Roll the Ball also features a level editor, where you can make your own creations and play them yourself afterwards! Choose between bunch of assets which are part of the game, add traps and falling platforms and enjoy your creations! Steam Workshop will be coming soon, so that you can share your maps with other people.

STORY

In the Prelude mode, players embark on a singular journey orchestrated by Timur to test the mettle of Sparky, a creation born from the ingenuity of Timur and his grandfather. However, as the journey climaxes, an unexpected twist sends Sparky on an unforeseen path, setting the stage for a tale of resilience and redemption. Beyond this introductory chapter, Sparky's encounters with Timur will continue to shape the unfolding saga across various game modes.

Features:

  • Immersive physics-driven gameplay that brings every movement to life, offering a dynamic and engaging experience.

  • Embark on an exhilarating journey through four distinct game modes, each offering its own unique challenges and thrills.

  • Collect coins and strive for star perfection, unlocking a plethora of rewards and bonuses as you progress.

  • Discover hidden trophies scattered throughout the game world, adding an extra layer of excitement and achievement to your adventure.

  • Customize your experience with a selection of 30 skins, allowing you to personalize your gameplay and stand out from the crowd.

  • Test your skills and determination in a game without checkpoints, offering a true test of endurance and perseverance.

  • Immerse yourself in the rich auditory landscape of the game with a diverse range of captivating soundtracks, enhancing every moment of your gameplay.

  • Harness the power of slow motion to navigate tricky obstacles and conquer challenging levels with precision and finesse.

  • Master a variety of different Steam achievements, rewarding your skill and dedication as you conquer each challenge and milestone.

  • Enjoy seamless immersion with localization available in 10 diverse languages, ensuring players from around the world can fully experience the game's captivating narrative and gameplay.

  • Dive deeper into the story with immersive voice-over narration.

Powered by Unreal Engine!

name: Roll the Ball

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 5th Generation
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 970 or AMD R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
  • Additional Notes: The specifications which are listed above are tested and the game runs perfectly with similar setup. There is a high chance game will run just fine on lower end PCs as well.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Balance, pace and win the race! Embark on a thrilling journey with Roll the Ball! Dive into vibrant visuals across three unique biomes as you race against the clock to reach the finish line. Choose from three engaging game modes, Time Rush, Challenge and Speed Run and try to reach the top!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Bosnian
*languages with full audio support
